directions: Cut cucumber into thin rounds using slicer. Stir together wasabi and cream cheese. Spread mixture on baguette, then make open-face sandwiches with cucumber, salmon, and ginger.
ingredients: 1 (24-inch) baguette, quartered crosswise, then each quarter halved horizontally and lightly toasted
title: Smoked Salmon, Wasabi, and Pickled Ginger Tartines
